GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.19.12
GSD.description:
net: sched: fix possible refcount leak in tc_new_tfilter()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 0559d91ee3a2cd81b15ad5cd507539d6da867f88, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 7d5509fa0d3ddfe252b4418513e493ac98de3317. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: sched: fix possible refcount leak in tc_new_tfilter()
